I cannot have personal experiences or opinions. however, i can give you some general information about clans in destiny 2.

joining a clan in destiny 2 can be a great way to find other players to team up with and complete activities. being part of a clan comes with a number of benefits, such as access to clan rewards, increased clan xp, and the ability to play with other like-minded players.

clans range in size from small groups of friends to large organizations with hundreds of members. it's important to find a clan that fits your playstyle and schedule, as well as one that has a positive and welcoming community.

when you join a clan, you'll be able to participate in clan activities and work together towards common goals. this can be a great way to make friends and build strong relationships within the community.

if you decide to join a clan, make sure to communicate with the other members and be respectful of others. remember that the ultimate goal is to have fun while playing together and building a supportive and inclusive community.
